original_text: And I weighed out to them the silver and the gold and the vessels, the offering for the house of our God that the king and his counselors and his lords and all Israel there present had offered.
korean_text: 그들에게 왕과 모사들과 방백들과 또 그 곳에 있는 이스라엘 무리가 우리 하나님의 성전을 위하여 드린 은과 금과 그릇들을 달아서 주었으니

sentences.original_text: And I weighed out to them
the silver and the gold and the vessels
the offering for the house of our God
that the king and his counselors and his lords
